using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace prorammer_jackpot
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int test = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            Console.ReadLine();
            for (int j = 0; j < test; j++)
            {

                long ans = 0;
                long a = Convert.ToInt64(Console.ReadLine());
                bool flag = true;
                for (int i = 0; i < a; i++)
                {
                    ans = 0;
                    string ab = i.ToString();
                    for (int k = 0; k < ab.Length; k++)
                    {
                        string c = ab[k].ToString();
                        ans = ans + Convert.ToInt64(c);
                    }
                    long n = ans + i;
                    if (n == a)
                    {
                        Console.WriteLine(i);
                        flag = false;
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (flag == true)
                {
                    Console.WriteLine("NONE");
                }
            }
            
        }
    }
}
